titleStmt.title: Credo resurrectionem carnis a tractate on the eleventh article of the Apostles Creed / by W.H. Esquire sometimes of Peter-house in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Hodson, William, fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.P. for N. Bourne, and are to be sold at this Shop, at the South Entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, and with print show-through; pages bound and filmed out of order.
Reproduction of original in: University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
